author: thelabdude
msg: SOLR-7487: Fix check-example-lucene-match-version Ant task to check luceneMatchVersion in solr/server/solr/configsets instead of example and harden error checking / validation logic.

author: chug
msg: QPID-6511: AMQP 0.10 windows clients cannot connect to no-auth qpidd broker.
1. Do not negotiate SASL EXTERNAL or PLAIN if no username is
specified. Note that a blank PLAIN password is allowed.
2. If SASL ANONYMOUS is negotiated then return a response of
"anonymous@<hostname>", which is what the linux client returns.
The client provides a username for the host in all cases.
